dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, big news from Kazakhstan, Host_A. Apparently, changing an entire country's time zone just, like, doesn't matter?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, big news from Kazakhstan, Host_A. Apparently, changing an entire country's time zone just, like, doesn't matter?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the study, the time zone change does not have negative consequences for the daily lives of Kazakhstanis.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: What? Doesn't matter? You're actually buying that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What? Doesn't matter? You're actually buying that?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, I mean, the government, they, um, they released a study. Says there were "no negative consequences for the daily lives of Kazakhstanis."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, I mean, the government, they, um, they released a study. Says there were no negative consequences for the daily lives of Kazakhstanis.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the study, the time zone change does not have negative consequences for the daily lives of Kazakhstanis.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A government study, right. About their own decision. Shocking results, I'm sure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A government study, right. About their own decision. Shocking results, I'm sure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, they said it was, like, "comprehensive." Experts were involved, data analysis, surveys, comparing things before and after.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, they said it was, like, comprehensive. Experts were involved, data analysis, surveys, comparing things before and after.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A monitoring of the practical impact of the time zone on public health, energy consumption, and labor productivity was conducted with the involvement of experts and research institutes. A comprehensive approach was applied, including data analysis, survey results, and a comparison of indicators before and after the time zone change,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Experts." The ones they hired, probably. And "surveys," too. I bet those were super objective.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Experts. The ones they hired, probably. And surveys, too. I bet those were super objective.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The Minister of Trade and Integration, Arman Shakkaliyev, he said it showed "no negative impact" on public health, energy, labor productivity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Minister of Trade and Integration, Arman Shakkaliyev, he said it showed no negative impact on public health, energy, labor productivity.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to him, the study results indicate no negative impact of the time zone change on key aspects of public life.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, because people love getting their sleep cycles messed with. Energy consumption stays the same, really?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, because people love getting their sleep cycles messed with. Energy consumption stays the same, really?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And the Prime Minister, Olzhas Bektenov, he, uh, echoed it. Said "no negative effects."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the Prime Minister, Olzhas Bektenov, he, uh, echoed it. Said no negative effects.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "The monitoring showed no negative effects from the decision to introduce a unified time zone," added Prime Minister Olzhas Bektenov

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but, like, didn't, uh, fifty thousand people sign a petition against this? Fifty thousand!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but, like, didn't, uh, fifty thousand people sign a petition against this? Fifty thousand!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In April, Kazakhstanis launched a petition to cancel the time change, gathering 50,000 signatures.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that was in April, I think. They wanted the change cancelled.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that was in April, I think. They wanted the change cancelled.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In April, Kazakhstanis launched a petition to cancel the time change, gathering 50,000 signatures.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And the government's response to fifty thousand citizens saying, "Hey, this is bad"?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the government's response to fifty thousand citizens saying, Hey, this is bad?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They, uh, rejected the request. Said the decision stands.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They, uh, rejected the request. Said the decision stands.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In August, the Ministry of Trade and Integration announced its final decision on the time zone petition, rejecting the request.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, a study paid for by the government, released by the government, says the government's decision is great, while the people are screaming it's not. And you're, like, okay with that narrative?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, a study paid for by the government, released by the government, says the government's decision is great, while the people are screaming it's not. And you're, like, okay with that narrative?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I'm just telling you what they announced, Host_A. Their official line.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm just telling you what they announced, Host_A. Their official line.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Their official line is total nonsense. Moving clocks back an hour for half the country just... doesn't affect anything? Uh-huh.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Their official line is total nonsense. Moving clocks back an hour for half the country just... doesn't affect anything? Uh-huh.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Astana, Almaty, Shymkent, and the regions of Akmola, Almaty, Zhambyl, Karaganda, Kostanay, Pavlodar, North Kazakhstan, Turkestan, East Kazakhstan, as well as the Abai, Zhetysu, and Ulytau regions, clocks were set back by one hour.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They did say it was about establishing a unified time, you know, UTC+5 for everyone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They did say it was about establishing a unified time, you know, U T C+five for everyone.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a result, the entire country moved to the UTC+5 time zone.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, 'unified'. Unified with absolutely zero negative impact on anyone. I don't buy it. Not for a second.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, 'unified'. Unified with absolutely zero negative impact on anyone. I don't buy it. Not for a second.
